summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Ultra Facial Oil-Free Cleanser is a gentle foaming face wash by Kiehl's Since 1851 for oily skin and normal skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsThoroughly removes impurities and leaves skin feeling clean and freshVisibly reduces excess oil on skin's surfaceLathers quickly into a cleansing foam that refreshes skin without over-dryingFor normal, oily and sensitive skinKey IngredientsDesert Plant Extract: has roots that contain high concentrations of potassium which is known to provide immediate and lasting hydration for dry skinLemon Fruit Extract: has a high percentage of vitamin C and is known for its astringent qualities; it helps freshen and stimulate skinItem 2536665How To UseGently massage oil-free cleanser into damp facial areasAvoid immediate eye areaRinse thoroughlyIngredientsAqua / Water, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Lauric Acid, Glyceryl Distearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Kaolin, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tetrasodium Edta, Citrus Limon Fruit Extract / Lemon Fruit Extract, Peg-14m, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently massage oil-free cleanser into damp facial areasAvoid immediate eye areaRinse thoroughly
ingredients: Citrus Limon Fruit Extract / Lemon Fruit Extract

reviews.headline: Great cleanser for oily skin
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this cleanser! I have oily, acne-prone skin, and this cleanser just makes my skin feel clean and oil-free when I use it.

reviews.headline: Get the original instead
reviews.comments:
I have really oily skin. This cleanser makes my face feel exactly like those old cleansers that would completely strip your skin of any traces of oil. It leaves my skin feeling uncomfortable…
The OG is the way to go.

reviews.headline: Favorite every day cleanser
reviews.comments: I have combination skin and this is a great cleanser. Even a plain dove bar soap left my forehead a little oily, but after using this I can apply moisturizer and get the perfect blend of what my skin needs. Nearly fragrance-free, which is also a major plus.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: Best cleanser. Originally i had a sample bottle roughly 2 oz and it lasted a long timw cause you really only need a little pea sized amount to really get clean. I have combination skin prone to dryness and this doesnt over oil or dry me out.

reviews.headline: The best face cleanser for oily skin
reviews.comments: For years I had normal/combination skin, but within the last couple years I started having noticeably oily skin, with breakouts focused around my chin. nothing I tried seemed to be helping it. After some research, I decided on this cleanser and it is the best decision I have made for my skin. It has helped my skin be significantly less oily (less breakouts) and a little bit of the product lathers nicely so it goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Ehhh
reviews.comments: I believe this is actually drying my face.  Now I need to put on a moisturizer in places on my face where I never needed it.

reviews.headline: Worth a try for oily skin
reviews.comments:
I have OILY skin in the summer, and pretty normal skin the rest of the year. I have used this for about 2 weeks now and it has made quite the difference in my ACNE PRONE, OILY skin. During the summer, I go from an occasional break out to a severe case of moderate acne--lots of whiteheads and a handful of nodules (the big painful ones that appear under your skin). I used this twice a day (morning and night) and it has done its part to control the acne  and treat it. TBH, I am thoroughly surprised it did as much as it does. I am going to keep using this for the summer and probably switch it out for the fall, but come back for it once the temperatures increase again. 

My general routine with this product: 
Cleanse
Occasional exfoliator 
Toner 
Serum 
Moisturizer

reviews.headline: Blackheads gone!
reviews.comments: I have been using this face wash for two weeks now and my blackheads and oily t-zone have gone away!

reviews.headline: Good, but not my favorite.
reviews.comments:
pros: no scent, a little goes a long way, & my face feels very soft the next day.

cons: kind of hard to wash off, makes my face feel tight/stripped, and it doesn't wash away everything.

i would recommend double cleansing, followed by a good moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Please read if the list below resonate with you
reviews.comments:
Key words/issues: 
•combination skin
•very oily skin in summer 
•hormonal breakouts 
•large pores
•blackheads 
•nothing else is working 

After constantly switching cleansers because nothing combated my breakouts, I was determined to find the "perfect" cleanser for my skin. I have tried everything from luxury to drug store cleansers: Kate Somerville, Dermalogica, Murad, Cetaphil, Mario Badescu, and Clean and Clear. Nothing worked as good as Kiehls cleanser. I have combination skin that is very oily in the summer and dry patches in the winter. The cleanser can feel like it is stripping your skin but if you have large pores, blackheads, and hormonal breakouts, it is worth it to combat the issues. My pores feel "cleaned" out. I have been using it for 4 weeks and my skin became more clear every day I used it. I no longer have weekly breakouts. I follow the cleanser with Clinique moisturizer and I only use the cleanser once a day.  I recommend this product if you have any of the following issues listed above.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: This is about my favorite cleanser. It makes your face feel really clean without drying it. I love using this product.

reviews.headline: Keihls does it again
reviews.comments: I love this I have combo skin and I use with my Clarisonic

reviews.headline: Great for oily skin type
reviews.comments: This cleanser is amazing for normal to oily skin type. So for the 1 star below, know your skin type! This is not for sensitive or dry skin. Amazing product, only need a pea size amount so this size lasted me an entire year using twice a day. That is very rare to find.

reviews.headline: Oil free great cleanser
reviews.comments: Only need a tiny bit for a nice clean oil free face

reviews.headline: Very happy
reviews.comments: I also received this product as a sample and have now purchased the full size. Small amount needed to lather whole face and I can use it to take my makeup off as well. I have a lot of trouble finding facial products because of my acne prone, red, oily skin and I also struggle with psoriasis. This cleanser is one of the only products I've found to clean my face well, not cause a breakout, and also not add to my redness. It is great.

reviews.headline: This SUCKS. My skin is even worse than before I started use.
reviews.comments: Never use this people, burns your skin, gives you plenty of rashes so don't use for sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Best cleanser ever
reviews.comments: I received this cleanser in one of my monthly box. It is amazing. You use about a pea size amount and it just grows and grows. It truly saves you so much money because it last so long. It goes on super creamy but rinses off super clean feeling. Trust me it is worth every cent. Run don't walk to purchase. My daughter and her husband use it to. I accidentally left my tube at their house after a visit and they fell in love with it they purchased it too.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have oily but dehydrated skin and have always found products that target oily skin to be a little over drying. I have faithfully used Kiehl's products for over 5 years and have loved all of them, but I've been waiting for a collection that targets dehydrated skin without adding oil, or oily skin without over drying. I'm so happy this collection is finally here!

I bought both the Ultra Facial Oil-Free Cleanser and Toner, and after using them for only 3 days now, I can already see an improvement in my skin. This new collection really cleans your skin without any drying effects. In fact, it actually locks moisture in! After only 3 days, my skin feels much softer and I've noticed that my skin is much less oily.

I highly recommend the new Ultra Facial Oil-Free product line to anyone with oily, dehydrated skin. I'm sure other skin types would benefit as well.

Thank you Kiehl's for this wonderful product line!
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally!

faceoff_negative.comments: I didn't like this product as much as I like the 'original recipe'. After washing my face with the product it feels as if there is a residue left behind. Don't get me wrong it might be great for really 'oily' skins but it doesn't work as well for my normal to oily skin. It also doesn't feel like it 'deep cleans' like the original product either.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not as good as the usual Ultra Facial Cleanser
